Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.75871015 0.10592615 0.79717522 0.57947727 0.71162229 0.43913265
#>  [7] 0.66085002 0.53013935 0.60993594 0.93857705 0.26613581 0.04631421
#> [13] 0.48872107 0.15187837 0.11402919 0.72126975 0.41810278 0.49030348
#> [19] 0.89617497 0.97938386
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.16158955 0.93857890 0.06608508 0.96260459 0.71653018 0.71174553
#>  [7] 0.23233207 0.23841047 0.84032450 0.96419414 0.73680154 0.59098296
#> [13] 0.09066524 0.18199229 0.15565803 0.20854415 0.73266270 0.03514591
#> [19] 0.92148069 0.19739804

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.75492608 0.78027593 0.80317818 0.26290653 0.81557130 0.03547986
#>  [7] 0.87152327 0.14935040 0.85570540 0.15095675
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.76558676 0.54458349 0.69472368 0.13686069 0.20983725 0.09789658
#>  [7] 0.15688943 0.46713288 0.21383900 0.14648186
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.5887854 0.5097257 0.1593511 0.9646045 0.8382344 0.1611824 0.5613884
#>  [8] 0.6416135 0.3582109 0.5443049

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.9354594 0.8791217 0.5036692 0.9769794 0.5078009
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.7831796 0.7872252 0.2133159 0.4556926 0.6163388
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.2863443 0.1076574 0.4262033 0.8029536 0.8244427
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9042462 0.5975748 0.1715003 0.1938533 0.2505818

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6034928 0.3737339 0.3597474 0.4336117 0.4106761
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.04006978 0.53096268 0.64882233 0.91834749 0.99361347
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9162315 0.5587401 0.1045012 0.3684903 0.8598477
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.3706935 0.2188447 0.3610966 0.5382351 0.3955893

mclapply

(ncores <- parallel::detectCores())
#> [1] 4
stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(parallel::mclapply, X=1:4, mc.cores = pmin(1,ncores-1))
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1777916 0.3951426 0.5466805 0.8592183 0.7967054
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8305527 0.9576760 0.7265784 0.3011735 0.4566429
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8877923 0.2316246 0.4284541 0.5385097 0.2034266
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.35361462 0.61212856 0.02861920 0.36323349 0.03099562

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.0         2.3          3.3         1.0 versicolor
#> 2          5.7         3.0          4.2         1.2 versicolor
#> 3          7.9         3.8          6.4         2.0  virginica
#> 4          5.5         2.6          4.4         1.2 versicolor
#> 5          6.0         2.9          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.2         2.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          6.1         2.6          5.6         1.4  virginica
#> 3          6.1         3.0          4.9         1.8  virginica
#> 4          6.3         2.9          5.6         1.8  virginica
#> 5          5.6         2.7          4.2         1.3 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.9         2.4          3.3         1.0 versicolor
#> 2          6.9         3.1          4.9         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          5.4         3.9          1.3         0.4     setosa
#> 4          6.1         2.8          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          5.1         3.8          1.6         0.2     setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.1         2.8
#> 2           6.0         3.4
#> 3           6.2         2.2
#> 4           6.5         2.8
#> 5           5.7         3.0
#> 6           5.6         2.5
#> 7           6.3         3.4
#> 8           5.7         2.8
#> 9           5.0         2.3
#> 10          6.0         2.2
#> 11          4.8         3.1
#> 12          4.6         3.4
#> 13          5.8         2.8
#> 14          5.0         3.2
#> 15          6.1         2.6
#> 16          4.9         3.1
#> 17          4.8         3.0
#> 18          6.8         3.2
#> 19          7.4         2.8
#> 20          5.9         3.2

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.7         3.3
#> 2          4.6         3.4
#> 3          7.2         3.6
#> 4          7.2         3.0
#> 5          4.8         3.4
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.0         3.5
#> 2          6.0         2.9
#> 3          6.7         3.3
#> 4          5.8         2.7
#> 5          6.6         2.9
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.7         3.0
#> 2          5.7         2.5
#> 3          5.0         2.3
#> 4          7.7         2.6
#> 5          6.3         2.5
